description:
gc: fix struct and array comparisons for new bool rules

The two optimizations for small structs and arrays
were missing the implicit cast from ideal bool.

Fixes issue 3351.

messages.text:
Hello rsc@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

LGTM

(rsc is on holiday, so i'll take this)

thanks for finding and fixing.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=8824dae9afdc ***

gc: fix struct and array comparisons for new bool rules

The two optimizations for small structs and arrays
were missing the implicit cast from ideal bool.

Fixes issue 3351.

CC=golang-dev
